prompts: Create a mythical Pokemon that embodies the spirit of nature with vibrant colors and intricate details.
I want a Pokemon that has a strong connection to forests and mountains, showcasing earthy tones.
Generate a unique creature that combines elements of a bull and a guardian spirit, with a fierce stance.
Make a Pokemon inspired by ancient rituals, adorned with tribal patterns and a dominant presence.
Imagine a powerful creature that can manipulate plants and nature, featuring bright red and green hues.
Design a dual-type Pokemon that thrives in lush environments, with a bold and striking color palette.
Give me a legendary Pokemon that represents strength and protection, with a majestic appearance and aura.

distinctive_features: Stout body with a bell at the end
